title: Oh, The Love That Sought Me
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c v4 c v5 c

v1: And on His shoulders brought me
While angels in His presence sang
Until the courts of heaven rang.
v2: And poured in oil and wine;
I never heard a sweeter voice,
It made my aching heart rejoice.
v3: For me His blood was shed;
I wondered what He saw in me,
v4: It seems as if eternal days
Are far too short to sound His praise.
v5: So while the hours are passing,
When He will call us to His side,
To be with Him, His spotless Bride.
c1: Oh, the love that sought me!
Oh, the blood that bought me!
Oh, the grace that brought me to the flock,
Wondrous grace that brought me to the flock!
